title: Mehmetçik Kut'ül-Amare
overview: The Mehmetçik Kut'ül-Amare series is about the legendary story of Mehmet and his friends in the Ottoman state prepared for the First World War, the only dream being the resurrection and salvation of the state, and nothing more than love in the heart. Mehmet, who is the subject of Darülfünun, does not hesitate to show any kind of sacrifice and effort for his homeland. For this purpose, he participates in Osmancık Taburari, where Süleyman Military Bey is located and the most capable soldiers are selected, and shows a great struggle to go to the front.
